Good experience. Doctor was friendly and managed my issue very well. Recommend the doctor for any teeth related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: In Have been going to dentists since 24 years...and had several Root Canal Treatments. But I have a very happy and special experience with Nikhil Sir. I was always scared to sit on a dentist chair. But sir made it very comfortable in understanding the problem and his words give you lot of confidence that all the treatment will be very comfortable and it is actually. I have got 4 root canals done in a single sitting in 2.5 hours, and never felt painful and uncomfortable. he is a specialist in dealing with root canals. He does the root canal treatment till the last minute with lot of passion and interest and patience without missing a single detail or single point in the treatment...at the same time understanding the pulse of the patient all through. I can name him as an "Artist in dealing with Root Canal Treatments". This is not prizing more or so...considering my past detailed experiences with all dentists...I am stating this. Very rare personality who has utmost passion in his profession. Appreciate It.Thanks a lot Nikhil Sir.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Here is my experience: I went to Vista clinic for pain I was having in my right lower teeth, Nikhil suggested we should first examine what is the issue( but he was 100 perc sure I have to go for RCT).. after 5 mins of treatment my teeth started bleeding and then he suggested we should go for RCT.. although I was in pain I asked him how much it will cost, he said it will cost 7000/- Rs, I said ok.. now after 30 mins of procedure I was given option of three cap ( crown) options 5000/-, 10000/- and 14000/- ( with 10 years warranty).. here I was in so much pain, but he wanted me select then and there which option to go for, I even asked, can I decide in 30 mins but no I had to decide then and there.. so in total I paid 21000/- for root canal ( beleive me he is not going to tell this in advance, so sharing it for public knowledge).. ******* * **** * **** **** ****** * ****** *** *** ***** ***** ******* ****** ******** **** ** ***** ** ******* **** ** ***** ******* **** **** ** ** *** **** *. so please be careful, my only request the prices and everything should be shared in advance and let the person decide if they want to go for it or not..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review:
I have been getting treated by Dr Nikhil for last 3 years, I can say he is the best Dental doctors I have interacted including few in Hyderabad and few in Bangalore in the past 20 years. I had a deep bite issue, had lost few molar teeth due to poor treatment and bad judgement from previous Dentists. He fixed the RCTs which weren’t done properly by previous doctors resulting into reoccurring infections and pus. Also his molar implants which were done 3 years back are quite stable with no issue as I write this review. I have burnt tremendous amount of money, time and hope over the last 20 years with multiple dental issues but now it seems I am in good hands. 
Keep up the good work Dr Nikhil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We visited Dr Nikhil Saran for my father's full mouth dental issues.

He is 68 years old and has BP,Sugar and Kidney related problems and was unable to eat properly due to teeth loss and all the previous dental treatments he had were not really helping.

Doctor suggested him to go with full mouth rehabilitation in the combination of root canals, crowns ,laser therapy and other methods to help him lead a normal life.

Doctor and the staff are really helpful, friendly and approachable which made the entire process very smooth.

Hoping for the best post treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Please don't fall for the positive stories. I had taken my wife for consultation and after 1 minute of examination the estimation quoted is approximately 30k for a decayed tooth. When we said we'll get back to him after discussing, the doctor didn't care to provide ****** medicine and just gave Dolo 650mg. **** **** *** ****** ** * ***** *** ********* *** ****** **** ****** ******* **** ** ************ **** ** *** ****** **** ****** *** *** **** ** ***** * ***** ** ***** ***** *** ****** *** *** ********** *** **** *** *** ******* ****** ********* ***** ***** *** ********* *** ** ******* ******* *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Throughout my life I have always had problems with my teeth and always are far back as my schooling I have been on a regular visit to the dentist. When I was sixty years of age I had a full bridge on my upper teeth which for a while looked good. Over the passed five years my gums had deteriorated so much so that I went from one infection to another which really depressed me. My dentist suggested that I called a gum specialist , but after a consultation he gave me the details of Smile Design. * ***** **** *** ******  ** *** **** *******  ** ********** ** ********* I have never had any pain at all. Unfortunately I had to have all my top teeth out and replaced. I had to have bone graft and what with Covid 19 it took a long time. Now I have my new teeth and I look and feel amazing. My thanks go to and his wonderful staff who had looked after me throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is simply amazing. Super friendly and very genuine. I have so many doubts regarding my dental health and he so patiently answers them all. I had to get a re rct done due to a bad experience and dr Nikhil did my treatment in single sitting. till date no issue in that tooth. I again had to get an rct done because of chipped tooth and again I had a really good experience with him. I am a very sensitive person when it comes to pain and I would definitely recommend dr Nikhil for painless RCT treatments

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: No doubt Dr. Nikhil Saran is extremely knowledgeable dentist, however when it comes to treatment, he is very very hard and harsh. I went to him for gum pain problem, he gave me some very valuable information but his treatment was very very very harsh and rough. He scraped my 3-4 top front teeth so hard that its still sensitive after 6 months. * ** ****** **** ***** **** ****** ***** ******* ** ******* **** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nikhil  performed a root canal on one of my back molars that had a bad infection, and he was incredible gentle and kind. The infection took a while to respond to the prescribed antibiotics. Dr. Nikhil made sure that it was cleared up before finishing the procedure, Once the root canal was finished, my mouth felt completely better. I would highly recommend Dr. Nikhil and his practice.

review:
I have been going to Dr Nikhil for 6 years now and I have recommended him to literally every person I know with a dental issue. 

He not only is patient but also explains literally everything you need to know before you get something done.

The root canal treatments I've gotten are pain free and I am actually someone who is petrified of dentists. Total recommend him to anyone who has any dental issue!
